

# BITSY VERSION 5.1

DLG ITM_0
"""
{sequence
  - WELCOME TO MY WORLD, INSECT
  - SHODAN? NO, I'M NOT SHODAN!
    I DON'T KNOW THEM
  - I AM THE BITSY ORACLE
  - I'LL JUST TELL YOUR FORTUNE 
  - BECAUSE EM HAD LESS THAN AN HOUR TO MAKE THIS WHOLE THING
}
"""

DLG SPR_0
"""
{shuffle
  - YOU WILL SOON MEET A{s = 0}
  - WATCH OUT FOR{s = 1}
  - WHAT'S UP WITH{s = 1}
  - CHOMP DOWN ON A{s = 0}
} {shuffle
  - LARGE
  - CUTE
  - MYSTERIOUS
  - BITSY
  - HUNGRY
  - PEANUT
} {shuffle
  - BORGER
  - CAT
  - STRANGER
  - ROBOT
  - BUTTER
  - CRAB
}{
  - s == 1 ?
    S
}{br}{br}TODAY'S LUCKY SYMBOL: {shuffle
  - {printItem "1"}
  - {printItem "2"}
  - {printItem "3"}
  - {printItem "4"}
  - {printItem "5"}
  - {printItem "6"}
}
"""

VAR s
0
